part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rumors of enormous folk who dwelt in the mountains of Qud seemed too bold for even that accursed land gone mad. Yet to behold such a thing seems so mundane. =pronouns.Possessive= eyes gaze upon you curiously yet with no obvious intent.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The meat is muscular and fatty.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Once apes took forth from their jungle home and took to the plains to build cities and make war. =pronouns.Subjective= lurks amidst the ruins of ancient city built by the hands of those who did not abandon their jungle homes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Once apes took forth from their jungle home and took to the plains to build cities and make war. =pronouns.Subjective= lurks amidst the wild jungles seeking to avenge an ancient wrong.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rough burred shoulders damp with limestone drippings anchor brutish arms, and =pronouns.possessive= broad back tenses with crag-like dorsi.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Fragments of old wars fought amidst the shade of trees scar and scatter the chitin hauberk of this enormous arachnid. Its claws are readied to make good their threatening enormity.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cruel marauder from beyond the northern mountains of Qud. Drawn far south by promises of ancient plunder and thriving flesh to stave off the great hunger of =pronouns.possessive= horde this scout leads the way. =pronouns.Possessive= clawed hand draws forth a wickedly designed bow.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: A disgusting feast of mealy flesh.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sunshame has left their skin pulpy and spider-white, and their capillaries are shot with blood two shades too dark. Battle-gnarled hands clutch at a weapon older than =pronouns.possessive= tribe.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A fortress of living flesh ensconced within endless crenelations of chitin armor. Whatever weak flesh lies beneath this impenitrable exoskeleton shall not readily be removed unto the light of day. How can the world support such a monstrous lifeform and its gluttony of aether-stuff?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wet nostrils flair at the seat of =pronouns.possessive= dropped snout, and furry arms wave in devious motions. =pronouns.Possessive= eyes are full of vicious mischief.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bristling spheroid shape which self shadows amidst the fractured light. It bristles with innumerable appendages by which the slightest touch shall bring cruel oblivion to end a war lost long ago.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An ancient artillery piece has been assimilated by a mechanical crawler who marches to the drums of a forgotten war.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: For all the inhuman horrors of the eater's rise and crushing fall not all of their artifice was in vain. The digitized howl of this mechanized imitation of a loyal companion reminds one of the terror for which this was designed to inspire.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A monster of the deep waters whose predation of benthic ecosystems has strengthened this colossal fish with the might and boldness to hunt the lake surface for prey.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Silt and mud dot the enormous scales.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A fragment of beautiful coral has broken free from earthly bonds and sprouted dread limbs. With crushing claws this lithe predator hunts ruthlessly for challenging prey.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its monstrous, shelled torso is downside up and sprouts a bouquet of crumpled legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A fragment of beautiful coral has broken free from earthly bonds and sprouted dread limbs. With scything claws this lithe predator hunts ruthlessly for challenging prey.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A brutal crustacean warrior dredged from the deep darkness. As the radiation burns off the crusts of Qud the cooling waters become a better home for such creatures.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its monstrous, shelled torso is downside up and sprouts a bouquet of crumpled legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A noble crustacean paladin drawn from the deep waters to find solitude and tranquility amidst the madness of Qud. =pronouns.Possessive= countenance lies beneath an enormous borrowed shell of some monstrous abyssal gastropod.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its monstrous, shelled torso is downside up and sprouts a bouquet of crumpled legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Before you stands one of the dirtiest people you have ever seen, and yet =pronouns.Subjective= appears sane enough as =pronouns.possessive= coat bristles with wares and clanks with each step. Rumors persist that one can buy anything from a filthmonger if you ask the right price, yet =pronouns.possessive= demeanor suggests that a fool question would warrant injury.

tag.Name: StaticLikeReason
tag.Value: providing goods where others could not

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A fragmented spirit whispers of fortunes and secrets. What price must one pay to claim such a prize?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wild little beast whose spines protect =pronouns.Subjective= from threats.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A scampering creature who searches out flesh to eat in the hidden places.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A foraging creature who searches out hidden roots to feast upon.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bald head crowns matted feathers. =pronouns.Possessive= stained beak is hooked for tearing flesh.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A winged predator watches for prey in the darkness. =pronouns.Possessive= sharp beak is readied for slaying wild things.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Such was the terror the elder relatives of such beast inspired that your eyes were invariably drawn in fear to the lithe form slinking along the ground.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A scampering creature who searches out flesh to eat in the hidden places. Having taken up the forsaken arms of fallen warriors =pronouns.subjective= now hunts foolish interlopers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Scaled wings uplift this soaring beast of an elder time. Scarlet scales reflect the bright flames of =pronouns.possessive= breath. Flesh scorches and grass withers at =pronouns.possessive= touch.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Slime within the quivering blob striates into different densities. You can barely perceive the outline of frog eggs within.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A newborn frog burst into the world in a state of profound hunger.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A strange spined sea urchin creature who has sprouted limbs with which to wage war on behalf of the unseen powers of the deep.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A mysterious echinoderm mystic who utters words without thought and fights in the psychic aether without consciousness.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A mysterious starfish like being who wields a monstrous warhammer with which to crush their foes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A monstrous starfish creature which devours all in its mindless path of destruction.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The severed remnant of a once mighty thorned starfish. It is still deadly even in its weakened state.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An enormous armored deep sea snail who meanders through the dark waters.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An enormous armored deep sea snail who meanders through the dark waters. =pronouns.Possessive= shell is covered in esoteric patterns of untold histories beneath forgotten seas and a chitinous harpoon peeks from the shadows beneath shell and body.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: You crunch the shell to pieces and your mouth fills with crackling slime.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A grandiose bivalve whose myriad eyes chart the dark traceries of the deep. Its eyes hungrily search for prey to ensnare in darkness.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Something enormous moves through the shadowed waters of the abyss. The apex predator and devourer of hopes squelches before you, the mighty colossal squid who long ago vanquished the last whale for dominion of the darkness beneath the deep.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's a little rubbery, but tasty.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A mighty shark of the deep who will turn a mortal's flesh to ribbons in a few moments of visceral carnage. It hunts in the darkness by sight unseen.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's a little cartilaginous, but tasty.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A dread angler fish whose light lures fools to their deaths. Its great illumined eyes search out flesh raveningly.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its flabby scaled vessel shuns easy description.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hideous hagfish slithers and squirms in the dark. Slime oozes from it as it scavenges in the depths.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A great devouring eel swimming through the shadowed depths searching for living flesh to consume. Its bulbous eyes pierce the shadows to search out intruders in the depths.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Deep in the depths of forgotten oceans a war once raged between the noble houses of the elder horseshoe crabs. Crabs were they scarcely at all and had been a part of the world long before that kindred appeared. The war amidst =pronouns.possessive= people saw the victory of one kindred over the other and the banishing of the latter to barren places. Yet in time their fortunes would reverse and the stricken limulicron would rise to dominance once more.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its monstrous, shelled torso is downside up and sprouts a bouquet of crumpled legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A mighty crustacean warrior whose claws shatter more than coconuts. From distant shores =pronouns.subjective= has ventured to seek fortune and glory as a mercenary for the kings of the deep places.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its monstrous, shelled torso is downside up and sprouts a bouquet of crumpled legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An enormous armored crustacean of the dark waters who can match the strength of even the mighty terrors of the deep. Grown strong in =pronouns.possessive= old age =pronouns.subjective= searches for worthy foes to battle and mewling prey to devour.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its monstrous, shelled torso is downside up and sprouts a bouquet of crumpled legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The water resonates with the clicking and clattering of shrimp in their burrows. Their formidable claws are capable of outputting deadly cavitation blasts to smite their foes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its monstrous, shelled torso is downside up and sprouts a bouquet of crumpled legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: You swim through the dark waters and behold an almighty power of the forgotten ages. Here towers a pillar of eternity's truth in shelled majesty, cast from the mould of gastropod kind (or perhaps the exemplar from which those snails were molded), the living god differs only in that =pronouns.subjective= bear a shell encrusted with the crenelations of earth's forgotten past. =pronouns.Possessive= shell is of proportions that suggest the endurance of the deep against the travails of time and extinction.=pronouns.possessive= aspect bears all the world's peace lost to time's raging tempests.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: You swim through the dark waters and behold an almighty power of the forgotten ages. This is the apex form which all life is inevitably drawn towards is envisaged here in shining chrome-chitin. Cast from the mould of crab kind (or perhaps the exemplar from which those crabs were molded by inexorable time), the living god differs only in that =pronouns.possessive= shell bears a gleaming crown of living chitin. =pronouns.Possessive= claws are of proportions that suggest the scavenging of fallen star gods for their divine ichors. Yet =pronouns.possessive= visage holds none of that all-consuming gluttony as =pronouns.subjective= contemplates the axis of infinity in peace.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: You swim through the dark waters and behold an almighty power of the forgotten ages. This is the ur-predator from which all life flees in terror. Cast from the mould of shark kind (or perhaps the exemplar from which those mighty fish were molded by inexorable time), the living god differs only in that =pronouns.possessive= fangs are cast from some eldritch chrome. =pronouns.Possessive= fangs are of such proportions as to devour all that the waking world could set before them. Yet =pronouns.possessive= visage holds none of that wicked avarice as =pronouns.subjective= contemplates what lies beyond the ramparts of consciousness.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: You swim through the dark waters and behold an almighty power of the forgotten ages. Here is a piled star-shaped colossus of knobbed flesh. Cast from the mould of starfish kind (or perhaps the exemplar from which those echinoderms were molded by inexorable time), the living god differs only in that =pronouns.possessive= vast arms bear the ornamentation of archaen hierarchies. =pronouns.Possessive= body is of such vast proportions that it must be the last spawn of some forgotten age. In spite of =pronouns.possessive= form bearing no visage =pronouns.possessive= radial symmetry seems to radiate a remarkable sense of calm in contemplation of the worlds that have been and may yet be.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The severed remnant of a once mighty echinoderm god. Full of all the primal rage of all the endlings lost to extinction's hunger in the many ages that have passed beneath the waters since the first ocean.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:are:afterpronoun= a =pronouns.personTerm= beyond the nightmare: muscles bubbling and seething in frustration with the limitations of the mortal form, skin blackened and scorched by the heat of the deep underground, and rotten fangs dripping with the blood of kinfolk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Behold a warrior of the shadowed city beneath the earth. Despite =pronouns.possessive= cannibal heritage this warrior is a hero in these dark places against the horrors which brood amidst the fallen masonry.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An enormous warrior of the shadowed subterranean tribes who uses =pronouns.possessive= might to hunt flesh in the shadows of the fallen city. =pronouns.Subjective= face bears but a single eye whether by strange mutation or chance injury battling the terrors of the darkness.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Those lost to shadow seek light and enlightment in their despair. For some lost to darkness found light in the mindfire and brought some security to their warped kinfolk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In the depths of the bleak darkness beneath the earth some turned to any hope however horrid for salvation from death. Some found their solace in their slavish adherence to the great worms of the deep. Waving their banners and chanting their praises is all that these mumbling fools know.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In the depths of the bleak darkness beneath the earth some turned to any hope however horrid for salvation from death. Some found their solace in their slavish adherence to the great worms of the deep. With sword and shield in hand few dare oppose the enforcers of the will of the worm gods.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An enormous titan of the subterranean world who gnaws at the foundations of the earth. Where the ground gives way to vast caverns =pronouns.subjective= may yet be blamed for =pronouns.possessive= hunger is vast. The little mutants of the deep places bow in fear of such an ur-predator and shaper of the dark domains.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Enormous rings of still, spongy wormbody are mixed with broken fangs, and colossal musculature scrape the earth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An enormous titan of the subterranean world who gnaws at the foundations of the earth. When caravans go missing as they traverse the vast wastes and grand caverns a likely culprit is a worm such as this. Hunting and burrowing beneath the fallen masonry to devour fresh flesh.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Massive rings of still, spongy wormbody are mixed with oozing blood, and fraying tendrills scrape the earth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Within the depths of the shadowed darkness dwell things which ought not be seen by any who walk beneath the sun. Spiders shirk the light at the best of times, yet there are kinfolk of the spiders who shun all the little illuminescence of the dark beneath.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Spiders are oft objects of horror to those who dread the darkness, yet some beauty can be found in the delicate weavings of the masterful spiders who craft their skeins across the vast catacombs of the dark cities beneath.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: While spiders are best known for their lurking within ruins and catacombs some hunt their prey with cruel avarice. While wolf spiders are known in various kindreds those of the shadowed depths of Qud hunt even the mighty creatures of the dark caverns.

part.Name: SplitOnDeath
part.Message: =subject.T= =verb:burst= into a swarm of spider broodlings!

part.Name: Description
part.Short: All living beings start their life in some manner of initial genesis, spiders are oft to swarm upon the back of their mother. A multitude of swarming eyes gaze upon the intruder within their mothers domain.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: With the death of their mother the swarming spiders now turn to vengeance against the slayer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In the dark depths of Qud beyond all light there exist fungal beings of a strange walking ilk. While most shamble mindlessly spewing spores, some march about at arms to make war against the enemies of fungus kind.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In the dark depths of Qud beyond all light there exist fungal beings of a strange walking ilk. Some shamble in ravening hunger and desire to spread the rotting spores to new flesh in which to incubate.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In the dark depths of Qud beyond all light there exist fungal beings of a strange walking ilk. Stranger kindreds exist clambering about and spouting spores mindlessly.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Vast towers of fungal chitin spout spores with furious abandon in the depths of the darkness beneath Qud.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Chittering legs in the high dozens lift the form of a mighty predator arthropod as it searches for flesh to devour. All but the mighty fear such a creature in the darkness which it calls home.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its torso is downside up and sprouts a bouquet of spines and crumpled legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A grand and brilliant beatle flitters through the dark hollows the magnificence of its horn only rivalled by the mighty unimax of the surface world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its torso is downside up and sprouts a bouquet of spines and crumpled legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A dreadful scavenging creature which searches for the fallen carrion discarded in the dark hollows where dread things make continual war among themselves.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Swarming hordes ply their way amidst the piled ruins of the dark beneath Qud. Amidst the armored arthropods here only the loathsome roaches walk with any nobility, their titles conferred by an unseen power to defend the ways of arthropod kind.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: You clamber through the ruins of elder aeons and behold an almighty power of those forgotten ages. This is the mighty nexus of the mycelial empires which lie beneath. Cast from the mould of mushroom kind (or perhaps the exemplar from which those strange fungi were molded by inexorable time), the living god differs only in that =pronouns.possessive= body extrudes mighty tentacles with which to bring justice to enemies of fungus-kind. =pronouns.Possessive= spore cap is of such vast proportions that it evokes the vile smokestacks of the elder Saad. Yet what can be determined of =pronouns.possessive= visage holds none of that vile pride as =pronouns.subjective= contemplates the crux of destinies in peace.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: You clamber through the ruins of elder aeons and behold an almighty power of those forgotten ages. This is the dread horror which has inspired all to fear that which crawls upon the earth. Cast from the mould of spider kind (or perhaps the exemplar from which those deadly arachnids were molded by inexorable time), the living god differs only in that =pronouns.possessive= webs are of spun aether to snare creatures of every ilk. =pronouns.Possessive= fangs are of such vast proportions that they evoke the horror of being a mere fly in the web of death. Yet =pronouns.possessive= countenance holds none of that fae cruelty as =pronouns.subjective= contemplates the enmeshing of the grand skeins of cosmic probabilities.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: You clamber through the ruins of elder aeons and behold an almighty power of those forgotten ages. This is that which crawls in the dark places of the earth and moves amidst the bones of the continents. Cast from the mould of worm kind (or perhaps the exemplar from which those squirming beasts were molded by inexorable time), the living god differs only in that =pronouns.possessive= colossal body writhes to the rythm of the grand magnetism. =pronouns.Possessive= body is of such gargantuan proportions that it must be the force which drove through the vast tunnels deeper than the eaters ever delved. Yet =pronouns.possessive= fanged countenance holds grand ambition as =pronouns.subjective= contemplates the foundations of reality as they unravel under the weight of cosmic ruin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: You clamber through the ruins of elder aeons and behold an almighty power of those forgotten ages. This is the embodiment of rage eternal. Cast from the mould of some unknown being of elder ages under the cold earth. =pronouns.Possessive= tusks are of such vast proportions that they could have split the sky from the land and the sea betwixt them in the days when the hoary gods shaped the world. =pronouns.Possessive= countenance holds infinite rage and hatred as =pronouns.subjective= contemplates the extinction of all that lives above the dead earth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: You clamber through the ruins of elder aeons and behold an almighty power of those forgotten ages. This matriarch of all that swarms and crawls upon the earth and beneath the earth. Cast from the mould of some unknown elder insect matriarch and shaped by inexorable time for the birthing of new broods of horrors. =pronouns.Possessive= form is of such colossal proportions it seems the mother of all monstrous things created by the hoary gods when they roamed upon the barren earth. Yet =pronouns.possessive= countenance holds none of elder cupidity as =pronouns.subjective= contemplates the day that the meek and monstrous shall inheret the cosmos.

part.Name: Spawner
part.SpawnMessage: The Hive God lays a new egg.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An enormous egg sac full of the Hive God's progeny. Its darkling cavities glint with swarming horrors yet to be born.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The swarming spawn of the dread Hive God rush to serve their mother even in their first moments.

part.Name: CannotBeInfluenced
part.Messages: Beguiling::The place where a mind should be is blank and smooth in =subject.t=.;;Persuasion_Proselytize::=subject.T's= commitment to =pronouns.possessive= ancient purpose is unwavering.;;LoveTonicApplicator::The tonic has no effect on =subject.t=.;;default::=subject.T= =verb:are= insensible to your blandishments.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: You crane your head and step back yet you can scarcely see the head of this great machine amidst the clouds. The world shakes at each slow yet enormous stride. It is as old as the now dead sultanate and yet still continues on its primordial trek to destinations unknown. It wears its age like the mountains themselves though one of the service hatches along its leg seems to have grown loose, beckoning portal to the almighty innards of this marvel of elder machinery.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hunched robotic being scuttles through the dark innards of the great machine following some unseen protocol. Its great mechanical claws and armored head provide sufficient menace to dissuade any intruder.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hunched robotic being scuttles through the dark innards of the great machine following some forgotten protocol. Its eyes glow with madness as its frantic movements suggest a decay in programming after millenia of service.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A robotic warrior strides across the halls of the great mechacolossus searching for evil. Organic lifeblood flows through this beings mechanical veins.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A robotic warrior stalks through the shadows within the great mechacolossus searching for weakness to exploit.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A robotic being walks about the great machine and continues in ancient servace in a manner akin to a devoted acolyte. Despite the ordinances having decayed duty calls all the same.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The once devoted robot now wanders aimlessly in the darkness having lost even its purpose to shadow.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Shadows dance through the darkness and light falters as the dread being drags itself forth to make war against the intruder within its usurped domain.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Chittering legs in the high dozens lift the form of an enormous arthropod warrior as it hunts its foes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Big diaphanous wings bat the air as =pronouns.subjective= searches for foes to vanquish.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An enormous bee flutters about as its wings beat powerful pheremones through the air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An enormous bee flutters about as its wings beat to a rythm of wrath.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A great beetle warrior flitters on mighty wings as it surveils its domain.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A great blood drinking mosquito searches for fresh blood to drink.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An enormous armored beetle noble whose body is a mighty armor.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Shining black elytra flitter on the back of an enormous warrior beetle.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A vile grub whose visage inspires allies to fight and enemies to fury.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cast from the mold of the great apes the half-god child differs only in that =pronouns.subjective= =verb:bear:afterpronoun= not two but four arms, each of which might be the fleeced trunk of a mighty cedar.The being struggles to maintain cherubic composure, =pronouns.possessive= aspect holds back a divine fury; =pronouns.subjective= =verb:don't:afterpronoun= rage but instead =verb:sit:afterpronoun= in frustrated contemplation.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Once apes took forth from their jungle home and took to the plains to build cities and make war. =pronouns.Subjective= was forged in the depths of primordial jungles, and now =pronouns.possessive= shrieks echo as if in imitation of those who left the jungle so long ago.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Once apes took forth from their jungle home and took to the plains to build cities and make war. =pronouns.Subjective= was forged in the depths of primordial jungles, and now =pronouns.possessive= grunts echo as if in imitation of those who left the jungle so long ago. =pronouns.Possessive= halberd is held with remarkable skill and intent.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Once apes took forth from their jungle home and took to the plains to build cities and make war. =pronouns.Subjective= was forged in the depths of primordial jungles, and now =pronouns.possessive= cackles echo as if in imitation of those who left the jungle so long ago. =pronouns.Possessive= crown gleams in the light.

part.Name: Spawner
part.SpawnMessage: Monkeys are drawn forth from dreams

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Subjective= has rejected the violent nature and quest for satiation which occupies the minds of =pronouns.possessive= kin. Forsaking strength this ape cultivates its mind and the powers within.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The meat is tough and fatty.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Whether =pronouns.subjective= was an eater aristocrat once or a forsaken noble scion of frog-kind it matters not for =pronouns.possessive= noble presence is an inspiration to all those around. Creatures of all ilk are enthralled by =pronouns.possessive= frog-song and tales of lost nobility told through croaks.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wet frog skin is pressed to the ground.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wind presses a sunbleached thawb and neckdress against a humanoid form atop a bestial shape. The fabric is embroidered to rhyme with patterns in the salt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Crushing the underbrush, sailing on air, a shiny behemoth of perfect chrome reflects the dim light peeking through the canopy's braided tresses, smog belches forth from its smokestacks. A colossal version of the knit mask worn by the Naphtaali rootdwellers adorns =pronouns.possessive= surface in imitation of a face. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:rotate:afterpronoun= with ruthless purpose.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Crushing the underbrush, sailing on air, a shiny behemoth of perfect chrome reflects the dim light peeking through the canopy's braided tresses, smog belches forth from its smokestacks. A colossal version of the knit mask worn by the Naphtaali rootdwellers adorns =pronouns.possessive= surface in imitation of a face. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:rotate:afterpronoun= with ruthless purpose.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A great beast of the vanished grasslands lurks in the depths of the rust-stained caves. Feasting upon the bones of the old dead and the flesh of young fools alike.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The meat is tough and visceral covered in golden fur.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blood-red feathers bend to an enormous curve of predation. =pronouns.Possessive= great talons and flesh-rending beak bracket =pronouns.possessive= body in scarlet hues. Such a bird has been known to carry even elephants aloft to devour.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The meat is flaky and surrounded in bloody feathers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A grand beast of a more primal world which gores.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The meat is fatty and gristly.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A mane courses over =pronouns.possessive= large and sloping beast shoulders and spends its weight in auburn locks. =pronouns.Possessive= bone and iron antlers rear back majestically amidst the clatter of rough hooves.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The meat is gamey and surprisingly tasty.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Mightier legs than =pronouns.possessive= ursine cousins support an enormous slab of fur-matted muscle weight. =pronouns.Possessive= shortened nasal bone is crowned by five cutlass canines, bone-sharpened for cutting through anything that comes before it. Fear the caves that might house such a beast.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The meat is gamy and quite fatty.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This is among the mightiest of all spiders, =pronouns.possessive= twin heads are both blessing and curse providing an additional deadly bite at the cost of some loss of control. Beware the great webs of this beast.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Possessive= flesh is warped not by the ravages of mutation but by ancient cybernetics fused into young flesh. The meeting of ages knit together in mortal form leads to great strength amidst fleshly overclocking.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Possessive= flesh is warped by the ravages of mutation far more than any of their kinfolk. =pronouns.Possessive= three heads bicker and wail as they search for flesh to devour.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The meat is disgusting and nearly inedible.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A mess of umber hair drapes the jowls of a snarling great wolf, and two lengths of sharp canine bone drip =pronouns.possessive= rabid saliva.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The meat is gamy and stringy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The great slumping head of this colossal beast from the frozen north is an aspect of nature's true majesty. Gleaming Ivory Tusks are a sign of immense pride and deadly threat to all who would seek to unmake one of nature's trueborn monarchs. Yet for all this tremendousness =pronouns.possessive= eyes are kind and wise.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's the rotting yet still majestic remains of a true scion of nature.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cruel marauder from beyond the northern mountains of Qud. Drawn south by promises of ancient plunder and thriving flesh to stave off the great hunger of =pronouns.possessive= horde. =pronouns.Possessive= cackles echo cruelly from a fang-filled maw.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cruel marauder from beyond the northern mountains of Qud. Drawn south by promises of ancient plunder and thriving flesh to stave off the great hunger of =pronouns.possessive= horde. =pronouns.Possessive= grunts resound from =pronouns.possessive= barrelled chest.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A closed helm hides the stranger's visage. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:wear:afterpronoun= a suit of baroque armor and =pronouns.possessive= accent gives away only that they are not from around here.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A vast blob of moss sprawls across the local scenery yet as creatures approach it rises to slow and voracious vigor.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A vicious buzzing insect flies forth in search of blood amidst the sea of grass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hive of vicious terrors nestled amidst clumps of grass.

part.Name: Nest
part.SpawnMessage: A Wasp launches forth from the nest.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A marauding insect warrior lurks in the brush.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cast from the mold of the great apes and drawn forth from the collective dream space into half-being amidst the delirium of simians. It glows with power as it beats its chest with its titanic arms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cast from the mold of the great apes and drawn forth from the collective dream space into half-being amidst the delirium of simians. He glows with power as he beats his chest with his titanic arms. His visage bears some resemblance to something half-remembered. He roars at the intruder in his illusory domain.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cast from the mold of the arboreal monkeys and drawn forth from the collective dream space into half-being amidst the delirium of simians. She glows with power as she stares menacingly at you. Her visage bears some resemblance to something half-remembered. She shrieks at the intruder in her illusory domain.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cast from the mold of the great apes and drawn forth from the collective dream space into half-being amidst the delirium of simians. He glows with power as he beats his chest with his titanic arms. His visage bears some resemblance to something half-remembered. He cackles at the intruder in his illusory domain.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Once apes took forth from their jungle home and took to the plains to build cities and make war. =pronouns.Subjective= was forged in the depths of primordial dream jungles. =pronouns.Subjective= eyes you fearfully.
